snippet: Dynegy files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, the latest step to restructure the ailing energy company and settle with creditors who hold more than $2.5 billion in claims over one of its subsidiaries.
abstract: Dynegy files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, the latest step to restructure the ailing energy company and settle with creditors who hold more than $2.5 billion in claims over one of its subsidiaries.

headline.main: Dynegy Files for Bankruptcy as Part of Settlement
headline.print_headline: Company News: Dynegy Files For Bankruptcy In Restructuring Plan
